DIY bird feeder: A trash can can be transformed into a bird feeder by filling it with birdseed and hanging it from a tree.
Compost bin: A trash can can be used as a compost bin to turn food scraps and other organic waste into nutrient-rich soil for gardening.
Outdoor seating: A trash can can be used as an unconventional outdoor seating option, especially for small gatherings or picnics.
Pencil holder: A trash can can be transformed into a unique pencil holder for your desk or office.
Coffee table: A trash can can be repurposed as a coffee table by placing a glass top on it and adding a tray or a small table.
